page.title: 17ATTITUDES
page.content: As in any other small{community,}it appears that everyone is aware what is going on with everyone else.Indeed, a great deal of care and concern is shown to anyone in the need of help. During the winter months when the tourists have gone, the money raising events take place ,(i.e. whist and domino drives, discos and various 'Pub' entertainments.) {General public concern}is often felt about planning permissions, and the fact that the Parish Council may often express their opinion to the National Park Committee only to have their wishes reversed all too frequently. There is also feeling about the re- routing and use of{footpaths.}Recently a great deal of planning, work and money has gone into the maintenance and internal improvements of the {Church.
